database.name: VIEW R_REQUEST_V
database.view: SELECT R_REQUEST_ID,AD_CLIENT_ID,AD_ORG_ID,ISACTIVE,CREATED,CREATEDBY,UPDATED,UPDATEDBY,DOCUMENTNO,REQUESTAMT,PRIORITY,DUETYPE,SUMMARY,ISESCALATED,DATELASTACTION,LASTRESULT,AD_USER_ID,C_BPARTNER_ID,C_CAMPAIGN_ID,C_ORDER_ID,C_INVOICE_ID,C_DEBT_PAYMENT_ID,M_PRODUCT_ID,C_PROJECT_ID,ACTIONTYPE,R_MAILTEXT_ID,MAILSUBJECT,MAILTEXT,RESULT,NEXTACTION,DATENEXTACTION,PROCESSING,PROCESSED,R_REQUESTTYPE_ID,SALESREP_ID,ISSELFSERVICE FROM R_Request WHERE IsActive='Y' AND Processed='N' AND SysDate > DateNextAction
